string-array.name: faq_titles
string-array.item: What is the purpose of this Business Registry application?
What are the key features of the application?
How do I submit a business registry request with the application?
How can I track the status of my request in real-time?
What information is required in the request form?
How does customer support work in the application?
How will I know when my request is approved?
How can I access the integrated support resources?
Is the application available on all mobile platforms?
How do I retrieve my business registry once the request is approved?

string-array.name: faq_descriptions
string-array.item: The main purpose of this application is to provide users with a user-friendly and intuitive interface to submit and track their business registry requests directly from their mobile phones.

Key features of the application include the ability to submit a business registry request, real-time tracking of request progress, access to integrated support resources, and facilitating direct customer support from within the application.

To submit a request, users need to download and install the application, log in to their account, select the "Submit a request" option from the home screen, and fill out the request form following the guidance provided by the application.

Once the request is submitted, users can use the "Track a request" option to access a dashboard displaying different stages of the process. Notifications will also be sent to inform users of important updates.

The request form includes sections such as business information (name, address, etc.), personal information of the applicant (name, date of birth, etc.), a declaration of accuracy, and a "Submit request" button.

The application offers a "Customer Support" option allowing users to directly contact support for questions or issues. They can send messages or call customer support directly from within the application.

Users will receive notifications on their phones throughout the process. Once the request is approved, a specific notification will be sent, indicating that the business registry is ready to be retrieved.
Users can access support resources, such as frequently asked questions and guidance, by selecting the Resources option from the application\'s home screen.
The application is available in mobile versions and can be downloaded on major platforms, such as Android and iOS.
Once the request is approved, the user will receive a notification stating that the business registry is ready. They can then retrieve it following the instructions provided within the application.
